name: Observation Request
description: The OBR segment is used to transmit observation request information.

fields.name: Set ID - OBR
fields.description: Sequence number for OBR segments within a message.

fields.name: Placer Order Number
fields.description: Order number assigned by the placer application.

fields.name: Filler Order Number
fields.description: Order number assigned by the filler application.

fields.name: Universal Service Identifier
fields.description: Identifies the observation/test/battery requested.

fields.name: Priority
fields.description: Priority of the observation request (deprecated, use TQ1).

fields.name: Requested Date/Time
fields.description: Date/time the observation was requested (deprecated, use TQ1).

fields.name: Observation Date/Time
fields.description: Clinically relevant date/time of the observation.

fields.name: Observation End Date/Time
fields.description: End date/time for the observation (for timed specimens).

fields.name: Collection Volume
fields.description: Volume of the specimen collected.

fields.name: Collector Identifier
fields.description: Identifier of the person who collected the specimen.

fields.name: Specimen Action Code
fields.description: Action to be taken with respect to the specimens.

fields.name: Danger Code
fields.description: Codes any known condition of danger associated with the specimen.

fields.name: Relevant Clinical Information
fields.description: Additional clinical information about the patient or specimen.

fields.name: Specimen Received Date/Time
fields.description: Date/time the specimen was received at the lab.

fields.name: Specimen Source
fields.description: Site and method of specimen collection (deprecated in v2.7).

fields.name: Ordering Provider
fields.description: Physician who ordered the observation.

fields.name: Order Callback Phone Number
fields.description: Phone number for callback about the order.

fields.name: Placer Field 1
fields.description: User-defined text field sent by the placer.

fields.name: Placer Field 2
fields.description: User-defined text field sent by the placer.

fields.name: Filler Field 1
fields.description: User-defined text field sent by the filler.

fields.name: Filler Field 2
fields.description: User-defined text field sent by the filler.

fields.name: Results Rpt/Status Chng Date/Time
fields.description: Date/time the results reported or status changed.

fields.name: Charge to Practice
fields.description: Charge to practice associated with the procedure.

fields.name: Diagnostic Service Section ID
fields.description: Section of the diagnostic service (LAB, RAD, etc.).

fields.name: Result Status
fields.description: Status of the results (F=Final, P=Preliminary, C=Correction, etc.).
